ExampleSentences.Sentence: After 18 months in captivity, the father and son were freed yesterday.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (Po 18 miesiącach w niewoli, ojciec i syn zostali wczoraj uwolnieni.)

ExampleSentences.Sentence: This animal can't survive in captivity.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (To zwierzę nie może żyć w niewoli.)
